properties.areaDesc: Maalaea Bay; Big Island Southeast Waters; Big Island Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 3:35PM HST until January 7 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 kt and seas 7 to 12 feet. For
Maalaea Bay, north winds 25 to 35 kt and seas 3 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...Maalaea Bay, Big Island Leeward Waters and Big Island
Southeast Waters.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are imminent or
occurring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions requires
experience and properly equipped vessels. It is highly
recommended that mariners without the proper experience seek safe
harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY
